Easy to Use - First, wet car paint fully with clean water or car wash cleaner, then stretch/ knead clay bar into a flat shape(without breaking apart), so this can enlarge cleaning area to improve cleaning efficiency. Second,repeatedly scrub the dirt on the paint surface with clean water or wash cleaner, it will absorb a lot of stains on the surface, until the surface is smooth and shiny.

name: Chemical Guys Clay Bar Kit - Complete System - Clay Bar and Luber Combo with Accessories for Smooth Paint Finish - Removes Embedded Dirt, Overspray, and Fallout - 6 Item Kit
short_description: COMPLETE CLAY SYSTEM (CLY700) – All-in-one kit includes car clay bar, lubricant, applicator, towel, and accessories to deep clean paint for a smooth-as-glass finish
REMOVES EMBEDDED DIRT – Detailing clay bar lifts overspray, brake dust, rail dust, and industrial fallout stuck in the paint for a better shine and protection.
INCLUDES LUBER CLAY LUBRICANT – Special Chemical Guys clay luber formula ensures the clay glides across the surface to minimize marring and maximize cleaning performance
PREPS PAINT FOR POLISHING OR WAX – Essential first step before applying sealants, ceramic coatings, or wax for optimal bonding and results; a great addition to your car detailing kit
SAFE FOR ALL VEHICLES – Use on cars, trucks, motorcycles, RVs, boats; a versatile auto detailing that is safe on clear coat, chrome, glass, plastic, and paint protection films
PERFECT DETAILING STARTER KIT – This clay bar kit for car detailing is ideal for beginners or pros looking to restore gloss and prep paint like a professional
product_description: Chemical Guys Complete Clay System (CLY700) provides everything you need to achieve a smooth, issue-free paint finish. This all-in-one kit includes a premium clay bar, Lubber Clay Lube, microfiber towel, applicator, and other essential accessories to remove embedded debris and prep your paint for detailing. From overspray and rail dust to road grime and industrial fallout, these microscopic embedded dirt can bond to your paint and dull your finish. This car clay bar kit safely removes them while minimizing scratches and marring, thanks to the slick lubrication provided by the Lubber Clay Lube. Use this Chemical Guys kit before polishing, sealing, waxing, or ceramic coating to ensure the smoothest, cleanest surface possible. It's safe on all painted surfaces, glass, plastic, metal, and even vinyl wraps or PPF. Whether you're just getting started in detailing or refreshing a well-loved ride, the Chemical Guys Complete Clay System delivers professional-grade prep in one convenient bundle. This automotive clay bar kit is a great addition to the car accessories of car owners and car enthusiasts. It can be used during routine car care and vehicle maintenance.

name: Chemical Guys CLAY_BLOCK_KIT Clay Block V2 and Clay Luber, Clayblock and Clay Super Lube, 16 fl oz
short_description: DEEP CLEANING - Removes embedded contaminants for a mirror-smooth finish.
INNOVATIVE DESIGN - ClayBlock V2 ensures easy handling and prevents dropping, outlasting traditional clay bars.
UNIVERSAL APPLICATION - Suitable for all automotive surfaces, restoring a pristine, smooth feel.
SPECIAL LUBRICANT - Clay Luber ensures the clay glides smoothly, preventing marring and enhancing results.
1 bar will do 15 to 25 full size vehicles. Decontaminate numerous cars with one product
product_description: The Clay Block V2 and Luber Surface Cleaner is the fastest, easiest and safest way to make your vehicle feel smooth as glass. The unique design of the clay block utilizes surface cleansing clay that makes paintwork, headlights, glass, wheels and painted plastic surfaces feel smooth to perfection. The surface cleansing block traps and removes embedded contaminants from the surface for the cleanest results possible. Traditional clay bars are often difficult to use and easy to drop. The Clay Block V2 is designed to be easy to handle with a cushion grip that conforms to the shape of your hand. The cushion grip allows for even pressure to be applied over the surface providing the highest quality results. Unlike traditional detailing clay, the Clay Block V2 can be easily cleaned with warm water if dropped on the ground. This kit comes complete with Luber Surface Cleaner. Luber is a high lubricity lubricant that is specially formulated to increase lubricity and reduce friction. Luber lubricates paint delivering a slick non-stick surface so that the clay block is easily and gently glided across the vehicle's paint surface removing dirt, grime, rail dust, water spots, tar, bugs and more.
